com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao

Class SeatDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.SeatDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SeatDao

    @ApplicationScoped
public class SeatDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements SeatDao
    The class SeatDaoImpl contains all the methods implementation to query the seats table. It contains the basic CRUD methods and additional methods that were needed. This class implements the SeatDao interface
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
